channel.title: [PI] Allow another client to connect and play
channel.description: I want a client not a webclient so I'm going to find another good PI client and put my webclients cache into its cache folder. But the problem is my server only allows my client. How can I change that? Also if you know any good PI clients tell me. Thanks!
